definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Shape the nail, using a file or emery board .
sentences.chinese: 塑造釘子，使用一個文件或金剛砂董事會。

sentences.english: Fine sand cloth or emery cloth may also be used with the same precautions.
sentences.chinese: 細砂布或金剛砂布也可以使用，但同樣要小心。

sentences.english: Layers of carbon and silicon carbide contain the radioactive material.
sentences.chinese: 層層碳和金剛砂包裹着這個放射性材料。

sentences.english: Finally, after diamond mortar powder grinding polishing, to complete.
sentences.chinese: 最後再經過金剛砂漿粉磨擦打光，才告全部完成。

sentences.english: A trademark used for an abrasive of silicon carbide crystals.
sentences.chinese: 金剛砂一種碳化硅晶體磨料的商標名。

sentences.english: You can use emery board to smoothen the ends of your fingernails.
sentences.chinese: 您可以使用金剛砂局順利結束你的指甲。

sentences.english: Do not use emery board to scrap your natural nail surface at all.
sentences.chinese: 不要使用金剛砂局取消您的自然指甲表面的。

sentences.english: Holes of varying diameters were drilled through the wall of cylindrical shell with diamond-sand drills.
sentences.chinese: 筒壁上的圓孔是用金剛砂鑽頭加工而成。

sentences.english: The emery is a hard metallic substance.
sentences.chinese: 金剛砂黑白常堅硬的金屬物質。
